alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 8:46PM CST until March 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Returns Tonight, Mostly North Of Interstate 90... .Snow returns to the region tonight, continuing through Wednesday. The bulk of the snow falls north of Interstate 90 tonight, shifting north of Interstate 94 on Wednesday. A few inches of accumulation look likely, predominantly north of Highway 10 in north-central Wisconsin. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Wednesday with the heaviest snow falling during the morning hours on Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
